## Cargando los datos

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
DF1 <- read_delim("data/EQUIPOS.txt","|")
DF2 <- read_delim("data/CONSULTAS_PORTA.txt","|")
DF3 <- read_delim("data/FACTURACION.txt","|")
DF4 <- read_delim("data/INDICADORES_RED.txt","|")
DF5 <- read_delim("data/INTENTOS_PORTA.txt","|")
DF6 <- read_delim("data/PLANTA.txt","|")
DF7 <- read_delim("data/TARGET.txt","|")
DF8 <- read_delim("data/TRAFICO_DATOS.txt","|")
DF9 <- read_delim("data/TRAFICOVOZSMS.txt","|")
```

### Limpieza 1

```{r}
data1 <- merge(DF1,DF8, by = c("ID1", "PERIODO"))
data1 %>% subset(select = -c(TRAF_DATOS_3G_NO_COSITE,TRAF_DATOS_3G_COSITE)) -> data1


temp1 <- DF6[, c("ID1", "PERIODO", "DEPARTAMENTO_XDR", "DEPARTAMENTO_CDR")]
data2 <- merge(data1,temp1, by=c("ID1","PERIODO"))

```

## Limpieza 2

```{r}
temp2 <- subset(DF9,select = -c(
  CALLS_OUT_ON,
  CALLS_OUT_OFF,
  DEST_VOICE_ON,
  DEST_VOICE_OFF,
  DAYS_OUT_VOICE_ON,
  DAYS_OUT_VOICE_OFF,
  CONT_ON,
  CONT_OFF,
  TOP_CONT_ON_5,
  TOP_CONT_OFF_5,
  CALLS_OUT_ON,
  CALLS_OUT_OFF,
  DEST_VOICE_ON,
  AIRTIME_IN_ON,
  AIRTIME_IN_OFF,
  CALLS_IN_ON,
  CALLS_IN_OFF,
  ORIG_VOICE_ON,
  ORIG_VOICE_OFF,
  DAYS_IN_VOICE_ON,
  DAYS_IN_VOICE_OFF,
  AIRTIME_OUT_ON,
  AIRTIME_OUT_OFF
))



data3 <- merge(data2, temp2, by=c("ID1", "PERIODO"))
```

## Limpieza 3

```{r}
data3$PERIODO <- as.character(data3$PERIODO)
```

```{r}
data3 %>% rename(ID = ID1,
         CHIP = EQUIPO_TEC,
         MARCA = EQUIPO_MARCA,
         MODELO = EQUIPO_MODELO,
         OS= EQUIPO_OS,
         DATOS_4G= TRAF_DATOS_4G,
         DATOS_3G= TRAF_DATOS_3G,
         DATOS_2G= TRAF_DATOS_2G,
         DATOS_TOTAL= TRAF_DATOS_TOTAL,
         DURACION_4G=TRAF_DURACION_4G,
         DURACION_3G=TRAF_DURACION_3G,
         DURACION_2G=TRAF_DURACION_2G
         ) -> data3

```

```{r}
write.csv(data3, "DataLimpia.csv", row.names = FALSE)
round(sum(is.na(data3))/(nrow(data3)*ncol(data3))*100 , digits = 2)
```
